parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.62

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Vehicle in Vehicle Transport

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns bool array if it is possible to load cargo inside vehicle and if possible to load cargo into empty vehicle

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> vehicle [[canVehicleCargo]] cargo

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]] - vehicle carrying cargo

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value>  cargo: [[Object]] - cargo to put in vehicle

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - [WillFitIntoCurrentVehicle, WillFitIntoEmptyVehicle]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> Blackfish with no vehicle cargo loaded
<code>_result = blackfish [[canVehicleCargo]] offroad; //[true, true]
</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> Blackfish with one vehicle cargo called offroad already loaded
<code>_result = blackfish [[canVehicleCargo]] offroad; //[false, false]
</code>
Even if the Blackfish was empty offroad can't be loaded because it is already in a cargo space

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> Blackfish with one vehicle cargo called offroad already loaded
<code>_result = blackfish [[canVehicleCargo]] offroad2; //[false, true]
</code>
offroad2 can't be loaded because there isn't enough space in the Blackfish, but if there was space offroad2 could be loaded into the Blackfish

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[Arma_3_Vehicle_in_Vehicle_Transport| Vehicle in Vehicle Transport ]] [[setVehicleCargo]] [[enableVehicleCargo]] [[getVehicleCargo]] [[isVehicleCargo]] [[vehicleCargoEnabled]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]</root>
